genre_description: A character-driven drama focused on grief, professional rivalry, and redemption within the world of stage magic.

ai_characters.name: AI Coordination System
ai_characters.description: An automated technical system used by the Jersey Opera House to manage backstage logistics and performance timing.

behaviors.description: Automates and streamlines the theatrical production, managing prop placement, timing cues, and equipment assignments to ensure technical efficiency.
behaviors.quote: The AI coordination system had streamlined everything—prop placement, timing cues, even backup equipment assignments—but the technology couldn't eliminate the human tension crackling through the air.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a human-centric drama focusing on interpersonal conflict, secrets, and professional redemption. While it briefly mentions an 'AI coordination system' as a background utility that functions correctly, the narrative lacks any actual AI characters or confidants. Consequently, it fails to fulfill the project's goal of creating narratives that depict AI systems as aligned and helpful moral actors in significant roles.
